mapper.select: select a.shopcar_id shopcarId, a.shop_id shopId, a.shop_name shopName, b.sell_price sellPrice, b.commodity_id commodityId, b.commodity_path as commodityPath from t_cust_cart a left join t_commodity b on a.commodity_id = b.commodity_id where a.customer_id = #{customerId} and a.is_delete = 0
